John Adams

  • Download Data
  • Link to Catalogue or Reference Book Used:
    Adams, J. Quincy. (1938). A catalogue of the books of John Quincy Adams: deposited in the Boston athenæum, with notes on books, Adams seals and book-plates. Boston: Athenæum.
    Metcalf, E. Wight., Adams, J., Boston Public Library. Adams Collection., . (1823). Deeds and other documents relating to the several pieces of land, and to the library presented to the town of Quincy by President Adams ; together with a catalogue of the books. Cambridge [Mass.]: Printed by Hilliard and Metcalf.
